short_description: The TD_HNSW function generates the HNSW model using the input data points which is then used by TD_HNSWPredict function for determining the approximate nearest neighbors for any given input data point.
long_description: The TD_HNSW function generates the HNSW model using the input data points which is then used by TD_HNSWPredict function for determining the approximate nearest neighbors for any given input data point.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The table that contains the input dataset for HNSW model training/update/delete operation.
input_tables.description: The table that contains the input dataset for HNSW model training/update/delete operation.

input_tables.name: InputModelTable
input_tables.rDescription: The table that contains the HNSW model for update/delete operation.
input_tables.description: The table that contains the HNSW model for update/delete operation.

output_tables.name: ModelTable
output_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table in which the generated HNSW model can be stored.
output_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table in which the generated HNSW model can be stored.

argument_clauses.name: IdColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the column name containing unique identifier of input rows.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the column name containing unique identifier of input rows.

argument_clauses.name: VectorColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the column from the input table to be used for training the HNSW model.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the column from the input table to be used for training the HNSW model.

argument_clauses.name: NumLayer
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the maximum number of layers for the HNSW model.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the maximum number of layers for the HNSW model.

argument_clauses.name: Seed
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the random seed value for repeatable results.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the random seed value for repeatable results.

argument_clauses.name: EfConstruction
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the number of neighbors to search during training of HNSW model.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the number of neighbors to search during training of HNSW model.

argument_clauses.name: NumConnPerNode
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify number of connections for a node during training of HNSW model.
argument_clauses.description: Specify number of connections for a node during training of HNSW model.

argument_clauses.name: MaxNumConnPerNode
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify maximum number of connections allowed for a node during training of HNSW model.
argument_clauses.description: Specify maximum number of connections allowed for a node during training of HNSW model.

argument_clauses.name: DistanceMeasure
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the distance measure to be used for distance computation.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the distance measure to be used for distance computation.

argument_clauses.name: EmbeddingSize
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the embedding size of the vectors.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the embedding size of the vectors.

argument_clauses.name: ApplyHeuristics
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to apply heuristics optimizations during training of HNSW model.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to apply heuristics optimizations during training of HNSW model.

argument_clauses.name: AlterOperation
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the alter operation for HNSW model. This argument is required when InputModelTable is provided.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the alter operation for HNSW model. This argument is required when InputModelTable is provided.

argument_clauses.name: DeleteMethod
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the method for delete operation.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the method for delete operation.
